name: David Ramirez
text: Hah, did not expect that. Actually, they undersell the CTE--even fighters/ football players who don't take as much damage as Ippo can develop bad symptoms years later--personal ity changes, cognitive issues, parkinson's, etc. So when he's already showing signs like that, they usually don't improve, they slowly get worse.
